name: Decrypto (itch)
description:
How does the game fit the theme 'Combining'?

This is a platformer game where you combine key input to get extra power-ups.

Credits:

SFX: https://soundsbydane.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack

Music: https://daniconshow.itch.io/8bit-music-pack

Graphic: https://tazmoe.itch.io/sci-fi-rougelike

Line to gamejam.com:

 https://gamejam.com/game/decrypto
